name: The Dark Tones: Loss
description:
The Dark Tones: Loss — will tell you a tragic story, the source of inspiration of which is the cult series of Silent Hill games and an equally iconic work — Cry of Fear

Attention to detail and surroundings

All game levels were created from scratch in order to provide the player with a unique environment, and not the same type of locations purchased on marketplaces. All the content of the game was arranged manually with great attention to detail in order to create a lively, filled and interesting game world.

The Dark Tones: Loss – is an atmospheric plot-oriented work

The short duration of the passage is compensated by the saturation and variety of events in the passage.
Here you will not find the same type of riddles, hours of searching for objects or aimless wandering around locations.
All the efforts, resources and time spent on the development of this game were aimed at creating an interesting, bright and meaningful work in which the duration of the gameplay plays a secondary role.

The realism of the story

Here you will not have to flee from the zombies, run from the ridiculous monsters and demented maniacs, but living the life of the main character you will face something much more terrible, everything that happens has a deeper meaning than it may seem at first glance, you have to get to the truth and put the puzzle together, but I hope that after the game no one will remain indifferent.

Modern game engine and technology

The game is being developed on the latest version of the Unreal Engine 5 engine using a realistic Lumen lighting system.

The world of dark tones will meet not only with a gloomy story and atmosphere, but also with pleasant realistic graphics with high detail of objects and textures.
